pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Summons a totem that periodically heals the summoner in an area around the totem.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 100$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 120 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 2
